title: N.W.T. gov't says it will fill the gap in federal funding for education assistants
description: On Thursday, the Northwest Territories government committed millions toward education assistant jobs. The start of this school year has been one of uncertainty: around 200 education assistant jobs are supported by federal Jordan's Principle funding, but much of that funding is in jeopardy. The territory says this new money, which is temporary, will ensure students receive the support they need.
